name: NSIP Use Cases
tagline: Repository for HITS Use Case feeds to RTD
body:
### Welcome to Use Cases
A repository of the raw source documents that are used to construct the HITS use cases.
Documents are in Sphinx markdown format, and will be pushed to the Read The Docs rendering engine for public access.

### How to Contribute
Use the GitHub client of your choice to clone the repository, edit the source of the use case documents, and commit new versions. Updated text will then be pushed forwards into the public RTD view once reviewed.

### Structure
- this section to explain repository structure as it is developed

### Tools & Dependencies
- things you will need to work locally with this content.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
